titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon preached on the occasion of the Right Honourable the Earl of Sh--y's late interment in Dorset-shire by W.B. a godly minister (though unworthy servant) of Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: W. B.

notesStmt.note: Not a sermon at all, but a Whig political harangue.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
